data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal volume Abolafia, Joaquín, Shokoohi, Ebrahim (2017): Description of Stegelletina lingulata sp. n. (Nematoda, Rhabditida, Cephalobidae) from xeric environments in Iran. Zootaxa 4358 (3), DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4358.3.4|4 occurrences
